problem.markdown:
>>1.Which is mainly used to grind materials in mineral,cement,refractory,chemical industry etc :<< (x) Impact crusher ( ) Ball mill ( ) Jaw crusher ( ) Rotary dryer
>>2.Which can crush materials with size smaller than 500 mm<< ( ) Impact crusher (x) Ball mill ( ) Rotary dryer ( ) Jaw crusher
>>3.Which is used as primary and secondary crushing equipment to crush material with compression strength less than 320MPa:<< ( ) Impact crusher ( ) Ball mill (x) Jaw crusher ( ) Rotary dryer
